mapper.delete: UPDATE customers SET is_actived=false WHERE id=#{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customers ( first_name, last_name, phone, address, email, city, state ) VALUES ( #{first_name}, #{last_name}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{email}, #{city}, #{state} );
mapper.update: UPDATE customers SET first_name=#{first_name}, last_name=#{last_name}, phone=#{phone}, address=#{address}, email=#{email}, city=#{city}, state=#{state} WHERE id=#{id};
